definitions.text: a textile machine for weaving yarn into a textile
come into view indistinctly, often threateningly
examples: Another air plane loomed into the sky

definitions.text: appear very large or occupy a commanding position
examples: The huge sculpture predominates over the fountain
Large shadows loomed on the canyon wall

definitions.text: hang over, as of something threatening, dark, or menacing
examples: The terrible vision brooded over her all day long
